articles.title: LIC share gains Rs 55 in a day! Insurance stock hits 52-week high on public shareholding news - IPO listing price still a distant dream? - ET Now

articles.content: Rs 55 gain in a day! LIC stock hits 52-week high on this news - How far is share price from IPO listing price?
